not-found.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.

home.name: Marcos Reyes Mart√≠nez
home.title: Computer Programming Analyst
home.aboutText: I'm Marcos Reyes Mart√≠nez, a passionate Computer Programming Analyst with years (and tons) of experience in Web Development and systems administration. I specialize in FullStack Web Development, as well as Linux and Windows systems administration, networks and computer security, protecting every component and detail to save your information.
home.contactProjectsTitle: Visit my projects or let's talk

services.anything: Whatever you need, to be honest

portfolio.banner_info: Each project in my portfolio showcases different technologies and skills that I have developed throughout my career. Demonstrating that there is not just one way to approach a problem, with creativity, intelligence, 'anarchism', and a passion for technology, I always find innovative and effective solutions.
portfolio.banner_info_note: Not all of my IT projects may be listed here, as I don't update this list constantly. To see them all, visit my GitHub profile:
portfolio.private_repo: This repository is private, I'm sorry üòà

personal.title: Personal Projects
personal.description: Personal projects developed to learn and experiment with new technologies and contribute to the community.

professional-practice.title: Professional Practice
professional-practice.description: Projects developed during my professional practice, applying knowledge acquired in a real environment.

institute.title: Institute Projects
institute.description: Projects developed as part of my academic training at the institute, Duoc UC. Focused on practical learning.

fumo-index.title: The Fumo Index („Åµ„ÇÇ)
fumo-index.description: Web platform for documentation and collection of FumoFumo plushies based on the Touhou video game series, now adapted to more franchises.

abbybot-project.title: AbbyBot Project
abbybot-project.description: Multifunctional Discord bot with moderation, music, and more features. Developed with Discord.py and, above all, lots of enthusiasm.

blog-astronautmarkus.title: AstronautMarkus Blog
blog-astronautmarkus.description: Tech blog where articles about web development, programming, and technology in general are shared. Created with Laravel and Tailwind CSS.

abbybot-project-website.title: AbbyBot Website
abbybot-project-website.description: Official website of the AbbyBot bot, where users can find information about the bot, its commands, and more. Developed with Flask and Bootstrap. Dockerized for production.

multi-stock-sync.title: Multi Stock Sync
multi-stock-sync.description: Software for product synchronization with Mercado Libre connection, using JWT for authentication and authorization, and a RESTful API for product management.

multi-stock-sync-back.title: Multi Stock Sync Back
multi-stock-sync-back.description: Backend of the product synchronization software, developed with Laravel. Implements JWT for authentication and authorization, and a RESTful API for product management.

multi-stock-sync-api-viewer.title: Multi Stock API Viewer
multi-stock-sync-api-viewer.description: API documentation for the product synchronization software, generated with Swagger. Allows developers to easily explore and test the API.

mofustore.title: MOFUStore
mofustore.description: E-commerce platform to buy Touhou Project fumos. Project completed in the second year of institute.

camellosfood-repartidor.title: CamellosFood - Delivery
camellosfood-repartidor.description: Food delivery app for Android, built with Ionic and Django.

constru-mic.title: CONSTRU_MIC
constru-mic.description: E-commerce platform for construction materials, developed with Django and Bootstrap.

puppies-crud.title: Puppies CRUD
puppies-crud.description: Simple CRUD to manage puppies, using Ionic and Json-Server.

mofulunches-web.title: MofuLunches Web
mofulunches-web.description: Flask frontend for the MofuLunches administration and cooks panel.

mofulunches-api.title: MofuLunches API
mofulunches-api.description: SOA backend for the MofuLunches platform, supporting mobile, web, and totem interfaces.

mofulunches-totem.title: MofuLunches Totem
mofulunches-totem.description: Application developed with Electron and Arduino to manage orders and payments.

mofulunches-eldimon.title: MofuLunches ElDimon
mofulunches-eldimon.description: Arduino script that manages communication with the MofuLunches API.

mofulunches-listener.title: MofuLunches ElDimon Listener
mofulunches-listener.description: Python GUI to scan and read ElDimon API events using PyQt5.

mofulunches-app.title: MofuLunches App
mofulunches-app.description: Mobile app for cooks, developed with Ionic, to manage orders in MofuLunches.

firestore.title: FireStore
firestore.description: This project is not mine, but thanks to it my classmate passed the semester. Mobile app to manage plant inventories in offices, developed with Ionic and Firebase.
